parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Config

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return root of config entries hierarchy.<br>
See [[AllInOne Config]] for a full config extract as example.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Config]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''configFile'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Config]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isMyClassActive = [[isClass]] ([[configFile]] / "CfgPatches" / "MyClass");</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[configClasses]], [[configProperties]], [[missionConfigFile]], [[campaignConfigFile]], [[config / name]], [[config greater greater name|config >> name]], [[configName]], [[count]], [[getArray]], [[getText]], [[getNumber]], [[inheritsFrom]], [[isArray]], [[isClass]], [[isNumber]], [[isText]], [[select]], [[configHierarchy]], [[getMissionConfigValue]], [[configSourceAddonList]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on Jul 19, 2014 - 20:08</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]<dd class="note">
<template lineStart="1"><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.24</value></part></template> It is recommended to use [[configClasses]] instead of [[BIS_fnc_getCfgSubClasses]] and [[BIS_fnc_uniqueClasses]] on subclasses collection or conditional selection.
<code>_faces = "[[true]]" [[configClasses]] ([[configFile]] >> "Cfgfaces");
//same as: _faces = (configfile >> "CfgFaces") [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_getCfgSubClasses]];
</code>
<code>//Extract all animals:
animals = "(([[configName]] _x) [[isKindOf]] 'animal')" [[configClasses]] ([[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles");
/*same as: 
aniamls = [];
[([[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles"),{
[[if]] (([[configName]] _this) [[isKindOf]] “animal”) [[then]] {
  animals [[set]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[count]] animals, _this]
  }
}
] [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_uniqueClasses]];*/
</code>
Return nested subclasses, currently still [[BIS_fnc_returnChildren]]
<code>//Return all nested config classes.<br>
[([[configFile]] >> "CfgFaces"),1, [[true]], [[true]] ] [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_returnChildren]];
</code>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
